pli-tv-pvr16:0.2: The sub-division on the robe-making ceremony
pli-tv-pvr16:1.1: Who has not participated in the robe-making ceremony?
pli-tv-pvr16:1.2: Who has participated in the robe-making ceremony?
pli-tv-pvr16:1.3: How is the robe-making ceremony not performed?
pli-tv-pvr16:1.4: How is the robe-making ceremony performed?
pli-tv-pvr16:2.1: “Who has not participated the robe-making ceremony?”
pli-tv-pvr16:2.3: those who have not performed the robe-making ceremony and those who have not expressed their appreciation.
pli-tv-pvr16:3.3: those who have performed the robe-making ceremony and those who have expressed their appreciation.
pli-tv-pvr16:4.1: “How is the robe-making ceremony not performed?”
pli-tv-pvr16:4.2: There are twenty-four ways in which the robe-making ceremony has not been performed:
pli-tv-pvr16:4.3: The robe-making ceremony hasn’t been performed merely by marking the cloth,
pli-tv-pvr16:4.7: merely by a tacking the cloth,
pli-tv-pvr16:4.9: merely by marking with a strip of cloth,
pli-tv-pvr16:4.11: merely by adding a border lengthwise,
pli-tv-pvr16:4.12: merely by adding a border crosswise,
pli-tv-pvr16:4.15: nor has it been performed if a monk has made an indication,
pli-tv-pvr16:4.16: if a monk has given a hint,
pli-tv-pvr16:4.17: if the robe-cloth has been borrowed,
pli-tv-pvr16:4.19: if it is to be relinquished,
pli-tv-pvr16:4.21: if it’s not an outer robe
pli-tv-pvr16:4.24: nor has it been performed if the robe hasn’t been made on that very day with five or more cut sections with panels,
pli-tv-pvr16:4.25: if the robe-making ceremony isn’t performed by an individual,
pli-tv-pvr16:4.26: or if the appreciation for the ceremony is expressed by someone outside the monastery zone.
pli-tv-pvr16:5.1: Making an indication: one makes an indication, thinking,
pli-tv-pvr16:5.2: “I will perform the robe-making ceremony with this cloth.”
pli-tv-pvr16:5.3: Hinting: one gives a hint, thinking,
pli-tv-pvr16:5.4: “With this hint, I will make a cloth for the robe-making ceremony appear.”
pli-tv-pvr16:5.5: Borrowed: taking what has not been given is so called.
pli-tv-pvr16:5.6: Stored: there are two kinds of storing:
pli-tv-pvr16:5.7: storing for the purpose of making and storing for the purpose of accumulation.
pli-tv-pvr16:5.8: To be relinquished: dawn arrives while it is being made.
pli-tv-pvr16:6.2: The robe-making ceremony is performed through seventeen aspects:
pli-tv-pvr16:6.3: The robe-making ceremony has been performed if the cloth is brand new, if it’s nearly new, if it’s old, if it’s a rag, if it’s from a shop; it has been performed if a monk hasn’t given a sign, if a monk hasn’t given a hint, if the robe-cloth hasn’t been borrowed, if it hasn’t been stored, if it’s not to be relinquished, if it has been marked, if it’s an outer robe or an upper robe or a sarong; it has been performed if the robe has been made on that very day with five or more cut sections with panels, if the robe-making ceremony is performed by an individual, and if the appreciation for the ceremony is expressed by someone inside the monastery zone.
pli-tv-pvr16:7.1: How many things are produced together with the participation in the robe-making ceremony?
pli-tv-pvr16:7.3: eight key terms, two obstacles, and five benefits.
pli-tv-pvr16:8.0: 2. The immediately preceding condition for the robe-making ceremony, etc.
pli-tv-pvr16:8.1: Which things are a condition for effort—by being an immediately preceding condition, by being an immediately prior condition, by being a support condition, by being a decisive support condition, by being a pre-arising condition, by being a post-arising condition, by being a co-arising condition?
pli-tv-pvr16:8.2: Which things are a condition for the prior duties—by being an immediately preceding condition …
pli-tv-pvr16:8.3: Which things are a condition for relinquishment …
pli-tv-pvr16:8.4: Which things are a condition for determining …
pli-tv-pvr16:8.5: Which things are a condition for participating in the robe-making ceremony …
pli-tv-pvr16:8.6: Which things are a condition for the key terms and the obstacles …
pli-tv-pvr16:8.7: Which things are a condition for the subject—by being an immediately preceding condition, by being an immediately prior condition, by being a support condition, by being a decisive support condition, by being a pre-arising condition, by being a post-arising condition, by being a co-arising condition?
pli-tv-pvr16:9.1: The prior duties are an immediately preceding condition for effort, and an immediately prior condition, a support condition, and a decisive support condition.
pli-tv-pvr16:9.2: Effort is a pre-arising condition for the prior duties.
pli-tv-pvr16:9.3: The prior duties are a post-arising condition for effort.
pli-tv-pvr16:9.4: The fifteen things are a co-arising condition.
pli-tv-pvr16:9.5: Relinquishment is an immediately preceding condition for the prior duties, and an immediately prior condition, a support condition, and a decisive support condition.
pli-tv-pvr16:9.6: The prior duties are a pre-arising condition for relinquishment.
pli-tv-pvr16:9.7: Relinquishment is a pre-arising condition for the prior duties.
pli-tv-pvr16:9.8: The fifteen things are a co-arising condition.
pli-tv-pvr16:9.9: Determining is an immediately preceding condition for relinquishment, and an immediately prior condition, a support condition, and a decisive support condition.
pli-tv-pvr16:9.10: Relinquishment is a pre-arising condition for determining.
pli-tv-pvr16:9.11: Determining is a pre-arising condition for relinquishment.
pli-tv-pvr16:9.12: The fifteen things are a co-arising condition.
pli-tv-pvr16:9.13: Performing the robe-making ceremony is an immediately preceding condition for determining, and an immediately prior condition, a support condition, and a decisive support condition.
pli-tv-pvr16:9.14: Determining is a pre-arising condition for performing the robe-making ceremony.
pli-tv-pvr16:9.15: Performing the robe-making ceremony is a pre-arising condition for determining.
pli-tv-pvr16:9.16: The fifteen things are a co-arising condition.
pli-tv-pvr16:9.17: The key terms and the obstacles are an immediately preceding condition for performing the robe-making ceremony, and an immediately prior condition, a support condition, and a decisive support condition.
pli-tv-pvr16:9.18: Performing the robe-making ceremony is a pre-arising condition for the key terms and the obstacles.
pli-tv-pvr16:9.19: The key terms and the obstacles are a pre-arising condition for performing the robe-making ceremony.
pli-tv-pvr16:9.20: The fifteen things are a co-arising condition.
pli-tv-pvr16:9.21: Expectation and non-expectation are an immediately preceding condition for the subject, and an immediately prior condition, a support condition, and a decisive support condition.
pli-tv-pvr16:9.22: The subject is a pre-arising condition for expectation and non-expectation.
pli-tv-pvr16:9.23: Expectation and non-expectation are a pre-arising condition for the subject.
pli-tv-pvr16:9.24: The fifteen things are a co-arising condition.
pli-tv-pvr16:10.0: 3. The details on the source of the prior duties, etc.
pli-tv-pvr16:10.1: What is the source, the origin, the birth, the arising, the production, the origination of the prior duties?
pli-tv-pvr16:10.2: What is the source, the origin, the birth, the arising, the production, the origination of relinquishment?
pli-tv-pvr16:10.3: What is the source, the origin, the birth, the arising, the production, the origination of determining?
pli-tv-pvr16:10.4: What is the source, the origin, the birth, the arising, the production, the origination of performing the robe-making ceremony?
pli-tv-pvr16:10.5: What is the source, the origin, the birth, the arising, the production, the origination of the key terms and the obstacles?
pli-tv-pvr16:10.6: What is the source, the origin, the birth, the arising, the production, the origination of expectation and non-expectation?
pli-tv-pvr16:11.1: The prior duties have effort as their source, origin, birth, arising, production, and origination.
pli-tv-pvr16:11.2: Relinquishment have the prior duties as its source, origin, birth, arising, production, and origination.
pli-tv-pvr16:11.3: Determining has relinquishment as its source, origin, birth, arising, production, and origination.
pli-tv-pvr16:11.4: Performing the robe-making ceremony has determining as its source, origin, birth, arising, production, and origination.
pli-tv-pvr16:11.5: The key terms and the obstacles has participating in the robe-making ceremony as its source, origin, birth, arising, production, and origination.
pli-tv-pvr16:11.6: Expectation and non-expectation have the key terms and the obstacles as their source, origin, birth, arising, production, and origination.
pli-tv-pvr16:12.1: What is the source, the origin, the birth, the arising, the production, the origination of effort?
pli-tv-pvr16:12.6: … of the key terms and the obstacles?
pli-tv-pvr16:12.8: What is the source, the origin, the birth, the arising, the production, the origination of expectation and non-expectation?
pli-tv-pvr16:13.1: Effort has cause as its source, origin, birth, arising, production, and origination.
pli-tv-pvr16:13.6: The key terms and the obstacles …
pli-tv-pvr16:13.8: Expectation and non-expectation have cause as their source, origin, birth, arising, production, and origination.
pli-tv-pvr16:14.1: What is the source, the origin, the birth, the arising, the production, the origination of effort?
pli-tv-pvr16:14.6: … of the key terms and the obstacles?
pli-tv-pvr16:14.8: What is the source, the origin, the birth, the arising, the production, the origination of expectation and non-expectation?
pli-tv-pvr16:15.1: Effort has condition as its source, origin, birth, arising, production, and origination.
pli-tv-pvr16:15.6: The key terms and the obstacles …
pli-tv-pvr16:15.8: Expectation and non-expectation have condition as their source, origin, birth, arising, production, and origination.
pli-tv-pvr16:16.1: How many things are the prior duties grouped with?
pli-tv-pvr16:16.3: washing, planning, cutting, tacking, sewing, dyeing, and making.
pli-tv-pvr16:17.1: How many things is relinquishment grouped with?
pli-tv-pvr16:17.3: the outer robe, the upper robe, and the sarong.
pli-tv-pvr16:18.1: How many things is determining grouped with?
pli-tv-pvr16:18.3: the outer robe, the upper robe, and the sarong.
pli-tv-pvr16:19.1: How many things is performing the robe-making ceremony grouped with?
pli-tv-pvr16:20.1: How many roots does the robe-making ceremony have, how many bases, and how many grounds?
pli-tv-pvr16:20.2: The robe-making ceremony has one root:
pli-tv-pvr16:20.5: the outer robe, the upper robe, and the sarong.
pli-tv-pvr16:20.7: linen, cotton, silk, wool, sunn hemp, and hemp.
pli-tv-pvr16:21.1: What is the beginning, the middle, and the end of the robe-making ceremony?
pli-tv-pvr16:21.2: The prior duties are the beginning, the action is the middle, the robe-making ceremony is the end.
pli-tv-pvr16:22.1: When a person has how many qualities, are they unable to perform the robe-making ceremony?
pli-tv-pvr16:22.2: When a person has how many qualities, are they able to perform the robe-making ceremony?
pli-tv-pvr16:22.3: A person who has eight qualities is unable to perform the robe-making ceremony.
pli-tv-pvr16:22.4: A person who has eight qualities is able to perform the robe-making ceremony.
pli-tv-pvr16:22.5: What are the eight qualities of a person who is unable to perform the robe-making ceremony?
pli-tv-pvr16:22.6: They do not know the prior duties, relinquishment, determining, the robe-making ceremony, the key terms, the obstacles, the ending of the robe season, or the benefits.
pli-tv-pvr16:22.8: What are the eight qualities of a person who is able to perform the robe-making ceremony?
pli-tv-pvr16:22.9: They know the prior duties, relinquishment, determining, the robe-making ceremony, the key terms, the obstacles, the ending of the robe season, and the benefits.
pli-tv-pvr16:23.1: For how many kinds of people is the robe-making ceremony not effective?
pli-tv-pvr16:23.2: For how many kinds of people is the robe-making ceremony effective?
pli-tv-pvr16:23.3: It is not effective for three kinds of people.
pli-tv-pvr16:23.4: It is effective for three kinds of people.
pli-tv-pvr16:23.5: For which three kinds of people is it not effective?
pli-tv-pvr16:23.6: For one who expresses their appreciation outside the monastery zone; for one who does not express their appreciation verbally; for one who expresses it verbally, but no one hears it.
pli-tv-pvr16:23.8: For which three kinds of people is it effective?
pli-tv-pvr16:23.9: For one who expresses their appreciation within the monastery zone; for one who expresses their appreciation verbally; for one who expresses it verbally and another hears it.
pli-tv-pvr16:24.1: How many kinds of robe-making ceremonies are invalid?
pli-tv-pvr16:24.2: How many kinds of robe-making ceremonies are valid?
pli-tv-pvr16:24.3: Three kinds of robe-making ceremonies are invalid.
pli-tv-pvr16:24.4: Three kinds of robe-making ceremonies are valid.
pli-tv-pvr16:24.5: What are the three kinds of robe-making ceremonies that are invalid?
pli-tv-pvr16:24.6: The subject fails; the timing fails; the making fails.
pli-tv-pvr16:24.8: What are the three kinds of robe-making ceremonies that are valid?
pli-tv-pvr16:24.9: The subject succeeds; the timing succeeds; the making succeeds.
pli-tv-pvr16:25.0: 4. The details on what is to be known about the robe-making ceremony, etc.
pli-tv-pvr16:25.1: The robe-making frame is to be known; the robe-making ceremony is to be known; the month of the robe-making ceremony is to be known; failure of the robe-making ceremony is to be known; success of the robe-making ceremony is to be known; the giving of an indication is to be known; a hint is to be known; borrowing is to be known; storing is to be known; relinquishment is to be known.
pli-tv-pvr16:26.1: “The robe-making frame is to be known”:
pli-tv-pvr16:26.2: the robe-making ceremony is the grouping and coming together of those things, their name, appellation, label, expression, wording, designation.
pli-tv-pvr16:27.1: “The month of the robe-making ceremony is to be known”:
pli-tv-pvr16:27.2: the last month of the rainy season.
pli-tv-pvr16:28.1: “Failure of the robe-making ceremony is to be known”:
pli-tv-pvr16:28.2: the robe-making ceremony fails in twenty-four ways.
pli-tv-pvr16:29.1: “Success of the robe-making ceremony is to be known”:
pli-tv-pvr16:29.2: The robe-making ceremony is successful through seventeen aspects.
pli-tv-pvr16:30.1: “The giving of an indication is to be known”:
pli-tv-pvr16:30.2: one makes an indication, thinking, “I will perform the robe-making ceremony with this cloth.”
pli-tv-pvr16:31.2: one gives a hint, thinking, “With this hint, I will make a cloth for the robe-making ceremony appear.”
pli-tv-pvr16:32.2: taking what has not been given.
pli-tv-pvr16:33.2: there is storing for the purpose of making and storing for the purpose of accumulation.
pli-tv-pvr16:34.2: dawn arrives while it is being made.
pli-tv-pvr16:35.1: “The robe-making ceremony is to be known”:
pli-tv-pvr16:35.2: If cloth has been given to the Sangha for the robe-making ceremony, what should the Sangha do? What should the one who performs the robe-making ceremony do? What should one who expresses their appreciation do?
pli-tv-pvr16:36.1: The Sangha should give the cloth, through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and one announcement, to the monk who is performing the robe-making ceremony. The monk who is performing the robe-making ceremony should wash the cloth, iron it, plan it, cut it, sew it, dye it, mark it, and then perform the robe-making ceremony.
pli-tv-pvr16:36.2: If he wishes to perform the robe-making ceremony with an outer robe, he should relinquish his old outer robe and then determine the new outer robe.
pli-tv-pvr16:36.3: He should then say, “I perform the robe-making ceremony with this outer robe.”
pli-tv-pvr16:36.4: If he wishes to perform the robe-making ceremony with an upper robe, he should relinquish his old outer robe and then determine the new outer robe.
pli-tv-pvr16:36.5: He should then say, “I perform the robe-making ceremony with this upper robe.”
pli-tv-pvr16:36.6: If he wishes to perform the robe-making ceremony with a sarong, he should relinquish his old outer robe and then determine the new outer robe.
pli-tv-pvr16:36.7: He should then say, “I perform the robe-making ceremony with this sarong.”
pli-tv-pvr16:36.8: After approaching the Sangha, that monk who is performing the robe-making ceremony should put his upper robe over one shoulder, raise his joined palms, and say:
pli-tv-pvr16:36.9: “Venerable Sir, the Sangha’s robe-making ceremony has been performed. The robe-making ceremony is legitimate. Please express your appreciation.”
pli-tv-pvr16:36.10: The monks who are expressing their appreciation should put their upper robe over one shoulder, raise their joined palms, and say:
pli-tv-pvr16:36.11: “The Sangha’s robe-making ceremony has been performed. The robe-making ceremony is legitimate. We express our appreciation.”
pli-tv-pvr16:36.12: After approaching several monks, that monk who is performing the robe-making ceremony should put his upper robe over one shoulder, raise his joined palms, and say:
pli-tv-pvr16:36.13: “Venerable Sir, the Sangha’s robe-making ceremony has been performed. The robe-making ceremony is legitimate. Please express your appreciation.”
pli-tv-pvr16:36.14: The monks who are expressing their appreciation should put their upper robe over one shoulder, raise their joined palms, and say:
pli-tv-pvr16:36.15: “The Sangha’s robe-making ceremony has been performed. The robe-making ceremony is legitimate. We express our appreciation.”
pli-tv-pvr16:36.16: After approaching a single monk, that monk who is performing the robe-making ceremony should put his upper robe over one shoulder, raise his joined palms, and say:
pli-tv-pvr16:36.17: “The Sangha’s robe-making ceremony has been performed. The robe-making ceremony is legitimate. Please express your appreciation.”
pli-tv-pvr16:36.18: The monk who is expressing his appreciation should put his upper robe over one shoulder, raise his joined palms, and say:
pli-tv-pvr16:36.19: “The Sangha’s robe-making ceremony has been performed. The robe-making ceremony is legitimate. I express my appreciation.”
pli-tv-pvr16:37.0: 5. The robe-making ceremony for an individual
pli-tv-pvr16:37.1: “Does the Sangha perform the robe-making ceremony; does a group perform the robe-making ceremony; does an individual perform the robe-making ceremony?”
pli-tv-pvr16:37.2: “The Sangha does not perform the robe-making ceremony, a group does not perform the robe-making ceremony, but an individual performs the robe-making ceremony.”
pli-tv-pvr16:37.3: If the Sangha does not do the robe-making ceremony, nor a group, but an individual does, then,
pli-tv-pvr16:37.4: the Sangha has not performed the robe-making ceremony, a group has not performed the robe-making ceremony, but an individual has performed the robe-making ceremony.
pli-tv-pvr16:37.5: “Does the Sangha recite the Monastic Code; does a group recite the Monastic Code; does an individual recites the Monastic Code?”
pli-tv-pvr16:37.6: “The Sangha does not recite the Monastic Code, a group does not recite the Monastic Code, but an individual recites the Monastic Code.”
pli-tv-pvr16:37.7: If the Sangha does not recite the Monastic Code, nor a group, but an individual does, then,
pli-tv-pvr16:37.8: the Sangha has not recited the Monastic Code, a group has not recited it, but an individual has.
pli-tv-pvr16:37.9: “When an individual recites to a united Sangha, to a united group, then the Monastic Code has been recited by the Sangha, by the group, and by the individual.
pli-tv-pvr16:37.10: It is in this way that the Sangha does not perform the robe-making ceremony, nor a group, but an individual does.
pli-tv-pvr16:37.11: When an individual performs the robe-making ceremony, and the Sangha expresses its appreciation, the group expresses its appreciation, then the robe-making ceremony has been performed by the Sangha, by the group, and by the individual.”
pli-tv-pvr16:38.0: 6. Questions and answers regarding the obstacles
pli-tv-pvr16:38.1: “The robe season comes to an end when one departs from the monastery.
pli-tv-pvr16:38.2: So said the Kinsman of the Sun.
pli-tv-pvr16:38.3: And about this I ask you:
pli-tv-pvr16:39.1: “The robe season comes to an end when one departs from the monastery.
pli-tv-pvr16:39.2: So said the Kinsman of the Sun.
pli-tv-pvr16:39.3: And about this I answer you:
pli-tv-pvr16:39.4: The robe obstacle is removed first.
pli-tv-pvr16:39.5: The monastery obstacle is removed when one is outside the monastery zone.”
pli-tv-pvr16:40.1: “The robe season comes to an end when the robe is finished.
pli-tv-pvr16:40.2: So said the Kinsman of the Sun.
pli-tv-pvr16:40.3: And about this I ask you:
pli-tv-pvr16:41.1: “The Sun that the robe season comes to an end when the robe is finished.
pli-tv-pvr16:41.2: So said the Kinsman of the Sun.
pli-tv-pvr16:41.3: And about this I answer you:
pli-tv-pvr16:41.4: The monastery obstacle is removed first.
pli-tv-pvr16:41.5: The robe obstacle is removed when the robe is finished.”
pli-tv-pvr16:42.1: “The robe season comes to an end when he makes that decision.
pli-tv-pvr16:42.2: So said the Kinsman of the Sun.
pli-tv-pvr16:42.3: And about this I ask you:
pli-tv-pvr16:43.1: “The robe season comes to an end when he makes that decision.
pli-tv-pvr16:43.2: So said the Kinsman of the Sun.
pli-tv-pvr16:43.3: And about this I answer you:
pli-tv-pvr16:43.4: The two obstacles are removed simultaneously.”
pli-tv-pvr16:44.1: “The robe season comes to an end when the robe-cloth is lost.
pli-tv-pvr16:44.2: So said the Kinsman of the Sun.
pli-tv-pvr16:44.3: And about this I ask you:
pli-tv-pvr16:45.1: “The robe season comes to an end when the robe-cloth is lost.
pli-tv-pvr16:45.2: So said the Kinsman of the Sun.
pli-tv-pvr16:45.3: And about this I answer you:
pli-tv-pvr16:45.4: The monastery obstacle is removed first.
pli-tv-pvr16:45.5: The robe obstacle is removed when the robe-cloth is lost.”
pli-tv-pvr16:46.1: “The robe season comes to an end when he hears about the end of the robe season.
pli-tv-pvr16:46.2: So said the Kinsman of the Sun.
pli-tv-pvr16:46.3: And about this I ask you:
pli-tv-pvr16:47.1: “The robe season comes to an end when he hears about the end of the robe season.
pli-tv-pvr16:47.2: So said the Kinsman of the Sun.
pli-tv-pvr16:47.3: And about this I answer you:
pli-tv-pvr16:47.4: The robe obstacle is removed first.
pli-tv-pvr16:47.5: The monastery obstacle is removed when one hears about the end of the robe season.”
pli-tv-pvr16:48.1: “The robe season comes to an end when the expectation is disappointed.
pli-tv-pvr16:48.2: So said the Kinsman of the Sun.
pli-tv-pvr16:48.3: And about this I ask you:
pli-tv-pvr16:49.1: “The robe season comes to an end when the expectation is disappointed.
pli-tv-pvr16:49.2: So said the Kinsman of the Sun.
pli-tv-pvr16:49.3: And about this I answer you:
pli-tv-pvr16:49.4: The monastery obstacle is removed first.
pli-tv-pvr16:49.5: The robe obstacle is removed when the expectation of more robe-cloth is disappointed.”
pli-tv-pvr16:50.1: “The robe season comes to an end while he is outside the monastery zone.
pli-tv-pvr16:50.2: So said the Kinsman of the Sun.
pli-tv-pvr16:50.3: And about this I ask you:
pli-tv-pvr16:51.1: “The robe season comes to an end while he is outside the monastery zone.
pli-tv-pvr16:51.2: So said the Kinsman of the Sun.
pli-tv-pvr16:51.3: And about this I answer you:
pli-tv-pvr16:51.4: The robe obstacle is removed first.
pli-tv-pvr16:51.5: The monastery obstacle is removed when one is outside the monastery zone.”
pli-tv-pvr16:52.1: “The robe season comes to an end together.
pli-tv-pvr16:52.2: So said the Kinsman of the Sun.
pli-tv-pvr16:52.3: And about this I ask you:
pli-tv-pvr16:53.1: “The robe season comes to an end together.
pli-tv-pvr16:53.2: So said the Kinsman of the Sun.
pli-tv-pvr16:53.3: And about this I answer you:
pli-tv-pvr16:53.4: The two obstacles are removed simultaneously.”
pli-tv-pvr16:54.1: How many kinds of endings of the robe season are dependent on the Sangha?
pli-tv-pvr16:54.2: How many kinds of endings of the robe season are dependent on an individual?
pli-tv-pvr16:54.3: How many kinds of endings of the robe season are dependent neither on the Sangha nor on an individual?
pli-tv-pvr16:54.4: One kind of ending of the robe season is dependent on the Sangha:
pli-tv-pvr16:54.5: when the robe season comes to an end midway.
pli-tv-pvr16:54.6: Four kinds of endings of the robe season are dependent on an individual:
pli-tv-pvr16:54.7: when one departs from the monastery, when the robe is finished, when one makes a decision, and when one is outside the monastery zone.
pli-tv-pvr16:54.8: Four kinds of endings of the robe season are dependent neither on the Sangha nor on an individual:
pli-tv-pvr16:54.9: when the robe-cloth is lost, when he hears about the end of the robe season, when an expectation of more robe-cloth is disappointed, and when the robe season comes to an end together.
pli-tv-pvr16:54.10: How many kinds of endings of the robe season happen within the monastery zone?
pli-tv-pvr16:54.11: How many kinds of endings of the robe season happen outside the monastery zone?
pli-tv-pvr16:54.12: How many kinds of endings of the robe season may happen within or outside the monastery zone?
pli-tv-pvr16:54.13: Two kinds of endings of the robe season happen within the monastery zone:
pli-tv-pvr16:54.14: when the robe season comes to an end midway, and when the robe season comes to an end together.
pli-tv-pvr16:54.15: Three kinds of endings of the robe season happen outside the monastery zone:
pli-tv-pvr16:54.16: when one departs from the monastery, when one hears about the end of the robe season, and when one is outside the monastery zone.
pli-tv-pvr16:54.17: Four kinds of endings of the robe season may happen within or outside the monastery zone:
pli-tv-pvr16:54.18: when the robe is finished, when he makes a decision, when the robe-cloth is lost, and when an expectation of more robe-cloth is disappointed.
pli-tv-pvr16:55.1: How many kinds of endings of the robe season arise together and end together?
pli-tv-pvr16:55.2: How many kinds of endings of the robe season arise together and end separately?
pli-tv-pvr16:55.3: “Two kinds of endings of the robe season arise together and end together:
pli-tv-pvr16:55.4: when the robe season comes to an end midway, and when the robe season comes to an end together.
pli-tv-pvr16:55.5: The rest of endings of the robe season arise together but end separately.”
pli-tv-pvr16:56.1: The sub-division on the robe-making ceremony is finished.
pli-tv-pvr16:58.4: And beginning, persons who perform the robe-making ceremony.
pli-tv-pvr16:59.1: For three, three, to be known,
pli-tv-pvr16:59.2: The robe-making ceremony, and with recitation;
pli-tv-pvr16:59.3: Obstacles, dependent on, with a monastery zone,
